channel.title: [urgent]unlimited specs[317]
channel.description: how can i make it so my server has unlimited specs or a single person has unlimited spec

item.title: [urgent]unlimited specs[317]
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“cocoa, post:7, topic:327970”][quote author=Spades link=topic=424355.msg3116566#msg3116566 date=1265048303]

if(command.startsWith("spec") && playerRights > 1){
specialAmount += 5000;
specAttack();
}

that’s only for a command so when u do ::Spec u have 5000 spec normal=100 (full spec bar)
so what others say is that u will always have it and it isn’t just one command u type

No shit sherlock, he asked for something for a single person to have ultimate spec. That is a command to give 5,000 spec amount, well over enough to kill someone.
[/quote]
What if the other guy has food that heals 99hp and eats at 1hp everytime.[/quote]
Sucks for him, at least he’ll have a bunch of spec, the other guy will run out of food eventually.

Read full topic

item.title: [urgent]unlimited specs[317]
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

Make it so when you use a special, it doesn’t drain special attack energy. So go to wherever your specialattacks code is stored. Delete everytime it has something similar to “specialAttack -= 50”

Read full topic
